code: import'../News.scss';import{CCard,CCardBody,CCardImage,CCardTitle,CCol,CRow}from'@coreui/react';import React,{useEffect}from'react';import Title from'../../../../../components/TitleofSection/Title';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{setNews}from'../../../redux/homePageSlice';import{baseUrl}from'../../../../../constants';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var AllNews=function AllNews(){var homePageState=useSelector(function(state){return state.homePage;});var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/news")).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){return dispatch(setNews({news:data}));});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"news",className:"news",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cards_container myContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{value:"X\u018FB\u018FRL\u018FR",isWhite:false})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CRow,{xs:{cols:1},md:{cols:3},className:"g-4",children:homePageState.news.map(function(card){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CCol,{xs:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CCard,{className:"h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:card.page,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CCardImage,{orientation:"top",src:card.imageSrc})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CCardBody,{className:"body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CCardTitle,{className:"header",children:card.header}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"text-medium-emphasis",children:card.date})]})]})},card.id);})})]})});};
